author: NBC News
title: Coronavirus live updates: U.S. deaths near 13,000 as Wuhan lifts lockdown
description: The U.S. recorded more than 12,000 coronavirus deaths on Tuesday, while the Chinese city of Wuhan celebrated the end of its lockdown.

As Easter approaches on Friday, a priest in Poland has found a creative way to continue taking confessions during the coronavirus crisis.
